components.title: Microsoft Lync 2013
components.description: Microsoft Lync 2013 based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ia-5.1.

implemented-requirements.description: The ability of Lync to store user passwords must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-23.

implemented-requirements.description:
Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) security mode must be configured.
In the event a secure Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) connection fails, the connection must be restricted from resorting to the unencrypted HTTP.
